title: Kubota RTV900 Diesel 4X4 ATV
item_description:
Kubota RTV900 Diesel 4X4 ATV

Specifications

  • Product ID Number: KRTV900A41017188
    • ID Number has no record on file with CA DMV
  • Hour Meter Reads: 9,515
  • Key: Available
  • Drive Type: AWD/4WD
  • Engine: 3 Cylinder
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Tire Size: 24x12.00
  • Deck Length: 48”
  • Deck Width: 54”
  • Wall Height: 12”

Note:  This item is being sold on behalf of an estate to clear the property. The ID found was verified with the California DMV where no record was found. Therefore, the buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only, which will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License/registration.
